Liquid experiments

the string literal "now" is passed to the date filter and will be evalualated as current date and time, and formated with the formating template string

we pass a string literal to the split filter with ', ' as the delimiter an the result is assigned to the variable

using the site.json static date include from _data

  • Test site

rendering holiday object as json with the json filter inside a <pre> tag


[{"title":"Christmas","date":"25/12"},{"title":"Boxing Day","date":"26/12"},{"title":"New Years Day","date":"1/1"}]

use a for loop to iterate over the holidays in the site.json static data

Christmas

Boxing Day

New Years Day

The for loop iterates over holidays in site and rendering the title snd date into specified table data tags. An alternate option would be the tablerow iteration loop

Title: Date:
Christmas 25/12
Boxing Day 26/12
New Years Day 1/1
